response.original_title: Anjos de Resgate Mais Que Amigos
response.overview: “Mais Que Amigos” is the fourth album by the band Anjos de Resgate, released in 2004 live at the Olimpo concert hall, in Rio de Janeiro. The album was recorded in celebration of International Friendship Day, with 21 (twenty-one) tracks and special appearances. “Mais Que Amigos” is the fourth album by the band Anjos de Resgate, released in 2004 live at the Olimpo concert hall, in Rio de Janeiro. The album was recorded in celebration of International Friendship Day, with 21 (twenty-one) tracks and special appearances.
response.title: Anjos de Resgate Mais Que Amigos
